Many years, and many hours later and I'm still playing. Collecting skins is like an addiction. Only few will understand. Game still holds up strong.

very fun and time consuming game, if you don't want to fight anyone and you want to chat, play the gamemode called surf, if you do want to fight someone, play almost any other gamemode. There is jailbreak, surf, tdm, ffa, search and destroy, v.i.p, and more!

This is an amazing game where you can play with friends or total strangers. It is super entertaining and you meet tones of new people and there is also heaps of different games available. The CS:GO community is generally fun and kind however, many people are quite toxic and will get angry at you if you do not perform well enough in a game (generally a competitive). All in hand this game is a great way to let off steam and have some fun. 

Max Templer
